texts: The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog.
The dog was a security guard, and the fox was a thief.
The dog lost his job the next day.
Foxes are mammals, often the size of housecats or slightly larger.
They are quick and often seen as cunning.
The show Dora includes a fox who is a thief
Dogs come in a variety of breeds and can be small or large.
Dogs vary in temperament. They can be energetic or lazy.
Dogs and cats living together often does not go well.
They can often fight and have different temperaments.
It is very bad to commit tax evasion, because it makes you an enemy of the state.
Don't try and be cunning and avoid the tax man.
They are quick and will catch you.
